name: Honey Curry Chicken
steps: In a gallon size zip-­‐loc bag, combine:
Melt 1 stick butter and put ½ of it in a 9x13 baking dish. Flip chicken in butter and bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
In a bowl, combine the rest of the butter, ¼ cup brown sugar, ¼ cup honey, ¼ cup lemon juice, 1 T. soy sauce,
and 1 ½ tsp. curry. Pour over chicken (after first 20 minutes) and bake 20 minutes longer, basting chicken
